entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:57 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
